Title: Senior Product Manager, Safety Foundation
RoleDescription:
Every day, tens of millions of people come to Roblox to explore, create, play, learn, and connect with friends in 3D immersive digital experiences all created by our global community of developers and creators. 
At Roblox, were building the tools and platform that empower our community to bring any experience that they can imagine to life. Our vision is to reimagine the way people come together, from anywhere in the world, and on any device. Were on a mission to connect a billion people with optimism and civility, and looking for amazing talent to help us get there. 
A career at Roblox means youll be working to shape the future of human interaction, solving unique technical challenges at scale, and helping to create safer, more civil shared experiences for everyone.Safety is at the core of everything we do at Roblox. As Roblox continues to grow in content diversity and user creativity, the complexity of safety challenges and the tools required to meet them is expanding just as rapidly. The Safety Foundation team aspires to scale our commitment to safety by building internal platforms and systems that act as a force multiplier for every team driving safety outcomes. 
As a Senior Product Manager, you will own the vision, strategy, and execution for a critical portfolio of enterprise-grade tools used by engineering, product, operations, ML, and policy teams across the company. These platform capabilities sit at the heart of moderation, trust, and global operations enabling Roblox to move fast without compromising on safety.
You will define and build highly technical systems that serve as the backbone of content and behavioral moderation. The technology you build will touch everything from asset moderation to ML labeling platforms to workforce orchestration and moderation analytics. Your work will directly enable Roblox to uphold our safety promise for a global community while scaling efficiently across billions of interactions, assets, and players.
This role reports to the Director of Product Management, Safety, based in San Mateo, CA and requires you to be at HQ 3 days/week.
What Youll Do

Define and own the long-term vision for internal safety platforms that support moderation of assets, social interactions, and community behavior across Roblox.
Build robust tools that empower engineering, policy, and operations teams to identify, triage, act on, and prevent abuse at global scale.
Lead cross-functional efforts to build:

Moderation pipelines and escalation tooling
ML labeling workflows
Workforce management systems and operational analytics

Drive platform capabilities that support automation, human moderation, and safety controls for every feature team at Roblox.
Collaborate deeply across engineering, data science, design, policy, ops, and feature PMs to understand emerging product features, risks and rapidly build tools to address them.
Continuously raise the bar on performance, usability, scalability, and observability of the internal tools ecosystem.
Define and measure platform KPIs that go beyond just tool usage and reflect speed, product, business and safety outcomes.

What You Bring

8+ years of hands-on product management experience, with at least 3 years leading technical or platform products.
A track record of delivering enterprise-grade tools or platforms used internally by technical teams (e.g., moderation platforms, dev tools, ML ops, analytics infra, data platforms).
A strong technical foundation that enables you to dive deep with product development, policy, operations etc. and reason about trade-offs in large-scale systems, and own cross-org architectural decisions.
Exceptional written and verbal communication skills and ability to bring clarity and align cross-functional stakeholders.
Proven ability to drive adoption and behavioral change across internal teams by delivering tools that are scalable, intuitive, and reliable.
Empathy for the operational, policy, and human aspects of safety and high judgment to build a platform that empowers both human decision-making and automation.
Experience working in user-generated content, trust & safety, or integrity-related domains is a strong plus.
